name: Cube Slider (Wilmer.R)
description: This game is still in the works. To play click play and it will immediately start. Press A & D to control the player left and right. When an object is touched you have to refresh page to play again. If player falls off platform it will re spawn but might have to refresh page also. Music is unavailable at the moment and do not press quit or you will have to refresh page. Thank you!!
